paragraphs.text:
Let us make our first Kafka client : a Producer.
  • Note that it is yust a simple main java program
  • All Kafka applications are yust simple java applications as this
paragraphs.conclusion:
Add these to your project and run consumer and producer.
Note:
  • The consumer sees only new messages (by default)!
  • So start consumer first, and then producer.

paragraphs.text:
Extra exercises on Producer: Study Apache Kafka website on producing:
  1. send with callback ('aangetekend versturen') See Documentation
  2. Or try out the transaction specified there

Extra exercises on Consuming: Study Apache Kafka website on consuming: See here
  1. Understand what is Committing on the consumer side.
For more info on this see Baeldung
